mms.controller.interfaces

Interface ISocietyFilmController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocietyFilmController

    public interface ISocietyFilmController
    Interface that defines the SocietyFilmController.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doAdd(boolean control)
      Opens up the film view or the person view to add a new film or actor, basing on the control flag.
      boolean doDelete(boolean control, java.lang.Integer code)
      Deletes the selected film or actor, basing on the control flag.
      void doEdit(boolean control, java.lang.Integer code)
      Opens up the film view or the person view t edit a film or an actor, basing on the control flag.
      void generateTable(boolean control)
      Generates the correct table of films or actors, basing on the control flag.
      void showDetailsFilm(java.lang.Integer filmCode)
      Opens up the details' film view.
